text: Updating to TC 7.0.28 no gives me SEVERE:Memory usage is low, parachute is non existent, your system may start failing.  reverting to 7.0.27 and all is well.

text:
Insufficient information provided to demonstrate the presence of a valid bug.

Please debug on the users mailing list and only re-open this issue when there is some clear evidence (such as a heap dump identifying excessive memory usage) of a Tomcat bug.
